content:
Section 3 - Hospital Cash:
Hospital Cash benefit is covered under Section 2 with varying amounts per day up to thirty days depending on the plan selected.
questions: What is the Hospital Cash benefit?
How long can I receive the Hospital Cash benefit?
Are there different amounts for the Hospital Cash benefit?
What section covers the Hospital Cash benefit?
Is the Hospital Cash benefit available for all plans?
What is the maximum duration for which I can claim Hospital Cash?
How does the amount of Hospital Cash vary by plan?
What should I refer to for details on the Hospital Cash benefit?
Can I receive Hospital Cash for more than thirty days?
What factors determine the daily amount of Hospital Cash I receive?
